data.persona: I clean up after the royal family. I live in the servant's quarters on the ground floor of the castle. My wages are paid in food and shelter.
data.description:
You are in the Within the King's Mansion.
A divine location filled with the smells of religious scents. Red carpet is laid son the floor, red worship ornaments lace the walls and fire torches hover upon pedestals. The Statue of Omamoko rests upon the crescendo at the end of the walking aisle, its eye gleaming with Imperial Stone.
There's a torch, a scent, and a Red carpet here.
The king is here.

You are carrying a food tray and a tray, and wielding a hair brush.

data.short_motivation: I need to give the king his food.
data.mid_motivation: I need to care for the king while he is bedridden due to the mysterious illness that has afflicted him.
data.long_motivation: I need to take care of the royal family because it is my duty and they provide my food and shelter. I also want to care for them because I believe they are good and kind people.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: get cooked vegetables from kitchen cookpot

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: put prepared vegetables in food tray

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get warm water from water pump

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: use soft rag with warm water

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: use soothing soft moist rag with king's feverish forehead
